alert.note: Alert for Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:36PM CDT until June 29 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LA SALLE AND SOUTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 236 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Sublette to near Mendota to 9 miles southwest of Earlville to near North Utica, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mendota, Earlville, Paw Paw, Sublette, Woodhaven Lakes, Troy Grove, Prairie Center, Triumph and Harding. This includes... Tri-County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-39 between mile markers 63 and 80. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
